title: Leading eSports games worldwide 2019 , by tournament prize pool
yAxis: Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Game Names.
The maximum Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars 64.37 is found at Game Name Fortnite and the minimum is found at Rainbow Six Siege where Game Name is 3.88.
Game Name Rainbow Six Siege has 16.59 times less Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars than Game Name Fortnite which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Game Name, and Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars in each Game Name on the y axis.
Game Name Fortnite has the highest Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars and Rainbow Six Siege has the lowest Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Game Names.
The maximum Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars 64.37 is found at Game Name Fortnite and the minimum is found at Rainbow Six Siege where Game Name is 3.88.
Game Name Rainbow Six Siege has 16.59 times less Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars than Game Name Fortnite which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Game Names.
The Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars is highest at Game Name Fortnite and lowest at Game Name Rainbow Six Siege.
The highest Game Name Fortnite has 60.49 more Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Game Name Rainbow Six Siege.
Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars at Game Name Fortnite is 64.37 , second place is DOTA 2 at 46.15, and thirdly is Counter-Strike: Global Offensive at 18.22.
Considered together, the average Total prize pool in million U.S. dollars in all 10 Game Names is roughly 17.95.
